attributes.action: demand that Google suspend or terminate their Street View project forthwith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the Prime Minister demand that Google immediately suspend all activities connected with their Street View project forthwith pending investigation in to it in relation to the privacy and invasion thereof including the intrusion of the individuals Human Rights. This also includes seeking the written consent of the property owner for inclusion within this project and if denied then to remove it immediately and censor any information (photographic or otherwise) pertaining to that property. Failure to comply should result in a payment to the affected person of not less than £25,000 per property. This should also include payment to the individual should, as a result of inclusion within this project, they or their property become susceptible to the affects of crime (including burglary) and the misuse of such information collected by Google in connection to crime pertaining to identity fraud.
